category.name: Schedule Manager
category.category_description: Allows configuring of Schedule Manager functionality.

preference.name: SM_GANTT_USE_ISO_8601_FOR_DATE
preference.preference_description: Specifies whether the calendar display in Gantt should follow the ISO 8601 standard to display the week numbers. The ISO 8601 standard denotes that the number of days to call a week as first week of the year should be greater than or equal to 4. Valid Values: True - The week number will be as per the ISO 8601 standard. In addition, the Start Of Week preference should be set to Monday, which is the start day of the week as per the ISO 8601 standard. False - The week number will be as per the locale in which Teamcenter is running.
